mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_num, shop_num, goods_name, goods_content, goods_main, goods_main_org, goods_image, goods_image_org, goods_price, delivery_cost) values (#{goodsNum}, #{shopNum}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsContent}, #{goodsMain}, #{goodsMainOrg}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsImageOrg}, null, null, #{goodsPrice}, #{deliveryCost})
mapper.select: select goods_num goodsNum, s.shop_num shopNum, goods_name goodsName, goods_content goodsContent, goods_main goodsMain, goods_main_org goodsMainOrg, goods_image goodsImage, goods_image_org goodsImageOrg, goods_price goodsPrice, delivery_cost deliveryCost from goods g, shop s where s.shop_num = #{shopNum}
